Dialogue:
Hi! I work at a POKEMON MART. It's a convenient shop, so please visit us in VIRIDIAN CITY. 
 I know, I'll give you a sample! Here you go!
You have too much stuff with you!
We also carry POKE BALLS for catching POKEMON!

See those ledges along the road? It's a bit scary, but you can jump from them.
 You can get back to PALLET TOWN quicker that way.

name: Mall
Dialogue: Do you want to buy something?
Come back when you need something
